price: They will abide in [the curse] forever. Their punishment will not be lightened, nor will they be granted any respite.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
